metadata.title: Image Resizer
metadata.description: A free, privacy-friendly tool to resize, compress, and convert images in your browser.

main.title: Image Resizer
main.description: Upload, resize, and optimize your images in seconds.

preview.title: Image Preview
preview.description: Your uploaded images will appear here.

noValidFiles.title: No valid files
noValidFiles.description: Please upload valid image files (PNG, JPEG, WebP, etc.).

noImages.title: No Images
noImages.description: Please upload one or more images first.

processingError.title: Processing Error
processingError.description: Something went wrong while processing your images.

footer.title: Image Resizer
footer.description: A simple, free, and privacy-focused tool to resize, compress, and convert your images right in your browser. No uploads, no data collection.

subtitleFlow.title: Subtitle Flow
subtitleFlow.description: A tool to create transcriptions with AI and export to any language.

autoCast.title: Auto Cast
autoCast.description: A tool to create podcasts with AI with a lot of customization.
